data.eml:eml: Acalyptris Meyrick: revision of the platani and staticis groups in Europe and the Mediterranean (Lepidoptera: Nepticulidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Van, Erik J. (2007): Acalyptris Meyrick: revision of the platani and staticis groups in Europe and the Mediterranean (Lepidoptera: Nepticulidae). Zootaxa 1436: 1-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273702
